author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Takeaway.Com Acquires BGmenu In Bulgaria And Oliviera In Romania‍​
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - TAKEAWAY.COM NV:
* ACQUIRES BGMENU IN BULGARIA AND OLIVIERA IN ROMANIA‍​ * THE ENTERPRISE VALUE FOR THE TRANSACTION IS €10.5 MILLION‍​
* TO FURTHER ACCELERATE GROWTH, TAKEAWAY.COM WILL SIGNIFICANTLY INVEST IN BOTH BULGARIA AND ROMANIA Source text : bit.ly/2BMUMSD Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
